Name: White Chocolate Apricot Coconut Bonbon
Description: A delicate bonbon made with a hard white chocolate shell and coconut shavings over a apricot creme with apricot chunks .

NameLocalization.zh: 白巧克力椰子杏仁夹心

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 단단한 화이트초콜렛에 큼직한 살구와 코코넛 가루를 넣은 살구 크림을 채운 섬세한 봉봉.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein zarter Bonbon aus einer harten weißen Schokoladenschale und Kokosnussspänen über einer Aprikosencreme mit Aprikosenstücken.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 稍硬的白巧克力包裹着杏仁奶油以及杏仁块，散落在外层装饰的椰子屑散发着淡淡的清香。“夏天跟秋天的完美结合！”
